JobFullDesc: The Dynamics 365 Connected Store team is looking for pioneers to help craft new products to transform the modern retail workplace. We use emerging technologies – including computer vision, IoT, and machine learning – to augment and improve the professional lives of retailers around the world, empowering them to achieve more.  Our focus is on enterprise scenarios and integrating physical data with business applications. We are building an end-to-end solution comprising both cloud services and edge processing.  Working with developing tech means you are an agile problem-solver who is not afraid of big challenges. What are we looking for from you? You embrace rapidly changing design demands and tight schedules. You not only have great ideas but also take ownership of product features and drive them to completion. If you have been searching for an opportunity to have a broad impact on Microsoft's plans for the future, this is the team to make that dream a reality. You will work on our service backend and drive our infrastructure readiness.ResponsibilitiesCreate long-term infrastructure, deployment and implement our release roadmap. Keep the backlog organized (within your group and across the service and other disciplines).Manage the cost and deployment of our dependencies Own the Business Continuity and Disaster Recovery scenarios.Own the gateway, DNS and load balancing infrastructures. Present your design to team leadership as well as to the engineering team to ensure alignment with our long term vision Assist (be hands-on, and set the example) in setting up new quality-driven practices for infrastructure, COGS and service layout.Provide technical guidance to the leadership team Coach leaders and engineers in the engineering team Have a passion for quality and reach for quality-driven outcomes as aligned with customer obsession and timeline pressure.
